nodes.text: The Serenno flying droid was a droid present at Count Dooku's castle on Serenno during the bounty hunter tournament there. It was used by Moralo Eval to attack Rako Hardeen, who was really the persona Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi was disguised in.
The asset for the droid in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "The Box" is taken from that of the Separatist probe droid in "Defenders of Peace."
